    java.util.Collection<node_info> weighted_graph.getV()

    java.util.Collection<node_info> weighted_graph.getV​(int node_id)
    This method returns a Collection containing all the nodes connected to node_id Note: this method can run in O(k) time, k - being the degree of node_id.

    java.util.List<node_info> weighted_graph_algorithms.shortestPath​(int src, int dest)
    returns the the shortest path between src to dest - as an ordered List of nodes: src--> n1-->n2-->...dest see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shortest_path_problem Note if no such path --> returns null;
    java.util.List<node_info> WGraph_Algo.shortestPath​(int src, int dest)
    method look for short path and print them first method run in all nodes and look for short path then in reveres run method equal tag between nodes an edge weighted to found shore path
